CustomField.description: Captures if email handler needs to send email to customer specified in “Contact” field of work order/custom object. For Work Order, this will be “SVMXC__Contact__c” and for others it will be specified in the custom setting
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Captures if email handler needs to send email to customer specified in “Contact” field of work order/custom object. For Work Order, this will be “SVMXC__Contact__c” and for others it will be specified in the custom setting
CustomField.label: Send Service Report To Contact
